attributes.action: Respect the wishes of the electorate of County Durham and NOT impose a Unitary Authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On the 19th June it was reported that 76% of voters in County Durham rejected a Unitary Authority
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/england/6767917.stm 

On 25th July it has been announced that Durham will become a Unitary Authority http://www.communities.gov.uk/index.asp?id=1002882&PressNoticeID=2470

We the undersigned deplore the obvious Gerrymandering and contempt for voters wishes that the Government is displaying
